Text: Re Gourmet group dinner reportSince we were together Tom checked the website for the New Orleans Wine and Food Experience Tom discovered it is now held in May The program is up and gives all the details The dates are May If you wish to check it out here it is After you have a chance to consider it perhaps we can decide as a group whether we want to take this on either in whole or in part We will get back to you later on our available dates for January Tom and Jerilynn Original Message From John Watson To Jerry Shirley Mills Sam Cook Phyllis Hamilton Kim Watson Jim McKinley Jerry Granacki Jerilynn Tom Daugherty Jennifer Harvey Hattie Thurlow McKinley Jeanne Singer A Lester Buck III Sent Monday November PM Subject Gourmet group dinner report Folks Thanks to Hattie and Jim McKinley for both planning the menu and opening their home for our dining pleasure on November The theme was CajunCreole and Hattie assigned recipes based on the Brennan family legacy of fine dining establishments in Louisiana and Texas From Sam Cooks crab puffs to Hatties Shrimp Remoulade and salad to Lester Bucks Oyster Artichoke Soup to Kim Johns Crab Imperial to Jerilynn Toms wonderful bread pudding souffle the entire meal was truly fantastic Jennifer and Jerry were unable to attend but reported that they had a great time on their Caribbean cruise even though it rained every day They missed a great meal although being on a cruise they probably didnt miss it too much During the appetizers Tom Jerilynn talked about how much fun they had attending the New Orleans Wine and Food Experience typically held in July every year There was discussion about the group booking hotel rooms and traveling to the Big Easy for this summer event If anyone has access to a large van motorhome or small bus we could make the trip together and have a great time For the January gathering the group decided that another dinner out was in order We decided that we would visit Marks American Cuisine on a Saturday night in January Everyone is to check their calendars and get back to me with the dates that do NOT work for them Reply to this message and delete the dates that are bad from the following January January January January After the Marks event Tom Jerilynn invited us to their home in March date to be determined That should bring everyone up to date Please get back to us as soon as possible with your January preferences so we can move ahead in planning that dinner Also your comments regarding a trip to NO next July would be welcome and we can make the final decision either in January or March See you soon Kim John
